# GET /v1/preReleaseVersions/{id}/relationships/builds | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/preReleaseVersions/{id}/relationships/builds ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-preReleaseVersions-_id_-relationships-builds)

-  GET /v1/preReleaseVersions/{id}/relationships/builds 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/preReleaseVersions/{id}/relationships/builds

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-preReleaseVersions-_id_-relationships-builds#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/preReleaseVersions/{id}/relationships/builds
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-preReleaseVersions-_id_-relationships-builds#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-preReleaseVersions-_id_-relationships-builds#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-preReleaseVersions-_id_-relationships-builds#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[PrereleaseVersionBuildsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/prereleaseversionbuildslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

[`List All Builds of a Prerelease Version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-prereleaseversions-_id_-builds)Get a list of builds of a specific prerelease version.
